Edges-Paladin -- Female Human Heroic Paladin
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d6 Strength: d12 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Brawny: +1 Strength Step (encumbrance and minimum strength requirements)
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d6
Gambling: (sma) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Healing: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Common
Skill Notes:
Brute: Advances Athletics relative to Strength/May use Strength vs. Athletics Tests
All Thumbs: Suffers -2 using mechanical and electrical devices; critical failure breaks device
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/May attempt Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: 1 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Gorum (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 16; Skill: 4
Description Notes: Brawny: +1 Size
Features
Edges (10 points): Brawny; Brute; Combat Reflexes; Danger Sense; Improved Nerves Of Steel; Mercy; Mount; Mystic Powers (Paladin); Nerves Of Steel; Paladin Hindrances: All Thumbs; Secret; Thin Skinned; Vow Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Paladin: Has Aura Of Courage, Code Of Honor+, Detect Evil, and Smite Evil features
Code Of Honor+: Always insists on acting nobly
Mount: Bonded mount gains Resilience and two advances and may be summoned
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 11 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d12+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10" AP 2); Short Sword (d12+d6); Unarmed (d12+d0)
Combat Notes:
Brawny: +1 Toughness
Improved Nerves Of Steel: Increased Nerves Of Steel effects
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Aura Of Courage: R10" Allies gain +1 to resist Fear
Brute: +1/+2/+4 thrown weapon range
Combat Reflexes: +2 on Shaken and Stunned recovery rolls
Nerves Of Steel: Ignores 2 points of Wound penalties
Smite Evil: May reroll failed attacks on 4 chosen evil foes/encounter
Arcana
Power Points: 10
Powers:
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP Tran) R4" Target gains +1 Trait Step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 Trait Step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 Step (Raise all) each rd) (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target gains free reroll 1/rd (Raise 1/action) or suffers -2 penalty; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Healing: (3 PP Conj) RTouch Target recovers from 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older Wound; +15 PP Heals crippling injury; +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius heals allies; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Relief: (1 PP Conj) R4" Removes Shaken, Distracted, or Vulnerable (Raise 2 of these) or numbs 1 Wound or fatigue penalty (Raise 2) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +3 PP Restores 1 energy-draining effect (Raise 2); +1 PP Removes Stunned condition)
Smite: (2 PP Tran) R4" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Inflicts +4 damage (Raise +6) as heavy weapon)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Mystic Powers (Paladin): 10 Power Points
Detect Evil: R4" May detect evil creatures and objects at will
Mercy: R6" Removes Distracted, Shaken, or Vulnerable from target
Mystic Powers (Paladin)-1: May cast self Boost Trait (Fighting, Strength, or Vigor), self Smite, Healing, and Relief w/automatic success (+2 Power Points for a Raise)
